item.title: What is Codenesium?
item.description: What is Codenesium? Codenesium is a collection of development tools and resources to help with development using the Microsoft .NET Core platform. API Generation We provide an API generation tool to generate code from a model definition. There are lots of ways to provide your model. Swagger definition Json C# class TypeScript class Simple model syntax Customize your routes and assign some templates and then generate some code.
